sentences.en: After 25 years of collecting recipes, she has compiled them into a cookbook.
sentences.cn: 她搜集了25年食谱，把它们编成一本烹饪书。

sentences.en: Bezanik is diving to collect marine organisms.
sentences.cn: 贝扎尼奇正在潜水采集海洋生物。

sentences.en: Collect the books and put them in a pile on my desk.
sentences.cn: 把书收起来放在我的桌子上.

sentences.en: He was grateful for a chance to relax and collect his thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他很庆幸有机会放松放松，整理一下自己的思绪。

sentences.en: I have come to collect my winnings.
sentences.cn: 我来领我赢的钱。

sentences.en: I used to collect stamps.
sentences.cn: 我曾经集过邮。

sentences.en: I'll send my boy round to collect the book.
sentences.cn: 我将派儿子去取书.

sentences.en: I’ve got to go and collect the book I ordered from the library.
sentences.cn: 我得去图书馆取我订的书了。

sentences.en: It's amazing how people collect so much stuff over the years.
sentences.cn: 人们竟然日积月累地收集了这么多东西，真令人惊叹。

sentences.en: Methane gas does collect in the mines around here.
sentences.cn: 周围的矿井里的确有沼气聚积。

sentences.en: On presentation of the relevant identity documents you may collect your property.
sentences.cn: 你只要出示有关的身份证件就可以领取你的财产.

sentences.en: Please don't stick the stamp on; I like to collect them.
sentences.cn: 请不要帖上这些邮票, 我要集邮的.

sentences.en: Rain collected in pools on the road.
sentences.cn: 路上积了一摊摊的雨水。

sentences.en: Rest assured, if you owe taxes, we will collect them.
sentences.cn: 不用多想，如果你欠税，我们会去收的。

sentences.en: She paused for a moment to collect herself.
sentences.cn: 她停了一会儿，让自己镇定下来。

sentences.en: Should you lose your ticket call collect on STA's helpline.
sentences.cn: 若遗失机票，请拨打STA的免费求助热线。

sentences.en: The company collects information about consumer trends.
sentences.cn: 这家公司搜集有关消费者趋向的信息。

sentences.en: The landlady came around once a month to collect the rent.
sentences.cn: 女房东每月过来一次收房租。

sentences.en: The winner will be there in person to collect the prize.
sentences.cn: 奖金获得者须本人来领取.

sentences.en: We’ve been out collecting signatures for our petition.
sentences.cn: 我们出去为我们的请愿征集签名。

sentences.en: Would you go and collect up the dishes?
sentences.cn: 你能去收拾一下碗筷吗？

words.tran_cn: 可收集的；可回收的（等于collectable）
集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的
收集成地；冷静地，镇定地
采集，聚集；[税收] 征收；收藏品；募捐
收藏家；[电子] 集电极；收税员；征收者
集团化；使集体化；使之成为共同的（等于collectivise）

phrases.tran_cn: 镇定下来，使自己平心静气
运费到付（到目的地后付运费）

trans.tran_en: to get and keep objects of the same type, because you think they are attractive or interesting
a short prayer in some Christian services

trans.tran_cn: 收集，收藏，领取，接走，积累，聚集，募捐，收款，赢得，获得
trans.tran_en: to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together
